description.content: The Savoy is the only luxury hotel on the River Thames, perfectly located in the heart of all that London has to offer, just steps away from vibrant Covent Garden. At the forefront of the luxury hotel scene for over 130 years, The Savoy boasts 267 rooms and suites accompanied by some of the best restaurants and bars in London, welcoming guests for an experience that continuously evolves to meet the desires of the modern traveller.

description.content: This elegant hotel is situated on Sloane Street at the heart of London. The hotel is situated just a short distance away from the many attractions that this impressive city has to offer. Guests will find themselves in close proximity to Buckingham Palace, Hyde Park and Knightsbridge underground station, which offers ease of access to other areas of the city. This wonderful hotel enjoys a charming architectural design, blending effortlessly with its refined surroundings. The guest rooms are superbly designed, oozing character and charm. The rooms are well equipped with modern amenities for added comfort and convenience. Business and leisure travellers will appreciate the host of facilities that the hotel has to offer. Heathrow Airport from Knightsbridge is 44-minute drive away from the hotel.
Includes 4-star hotels, 4-superior and 4 de luxe, boutiques, villas, historic hotels, rural hotels, lodges, farmhouses, resorts and portuguese pousadas.
Towels and bed linen at surcharge
Millennium & Copthorne - We Clean. We Care. We Welcome
